name: Sanctions
text: [§353G-9]  Sanctions.  Upon a positive drug test or any other substantive violation of any term or condition of a person's participation in a treatment program ordered pursuant to this chapter, the appropriate authority shall immediately impose such sanction or combination of sanctions as may be appropriate.  If the appropriate authority elects not to impose a sanction, the appropriate authority shall make a written finding setting forth the reasons for its decision. [L 1998, c 152, pt of §2]
